As part of the Office of the Chancellor, the Office for Access and Equity (OAE) strives to achieve and maintain equal opportunity, inclusiveness, equitable treatment and access to employment, programs, and services for all students, faculty, and staff at the University of Illinois at Chicago. To that end, OAE has developed both in-person and online interactive educational programs. Each training session is informative, engaging, and generally free of cost.
